snippet: The French authorities have banned a far-right youth rally set for Saturday in Toulouse after the killing of a leftist student this past week stirred alarm over violence by ultraright groups.
abstract: French authorities ban far-right youth rally in Toulouse after killing of a leftist student stirs alarm over violence by ultraright groups.
lead_paragraph: The French authorities have banned a far-right youth rally set for Saturday in Toulouse after the killing of a leftist student this past week stirred alarm over violence by ultraright groups.

headline.main: France: Officials Ban a Far-Right Rally
headline.print_headline: France: Officials Ban a Far-Right Rally
